Reviews.Title: very poor night vision
Reviews.Author: -a|ex
Reviews.Content: With daylight, the image quality is very good as I'm able to read the alarm clock from 25 feet on medium zoom. the only problem is that this is used for night time security and does not work well with my current IR array. The 0.1 lux is not sensitive enough. when used outdoors with moonlight, the human eye can see more in the darkness than this camera. since this does not have prime advantage, it may be difficult to return it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD Image sensor
Digital Signal Processor. High Resolution 700TV lines
Vari-Focal Lens f6-60mm. Effective pixels 510(H) x 492(V)
NTSC System; AES On/Off, BLC On/Off
Package included: one Professional Box Camera (body only), one 6-60mm Auto IRIS Vari-Focal lens, one 12V DC Fully Regulated CCTV Power Supply, One Universal Adjustable Camera Mounting bracket, one video power extension cable, one free surveillance warning decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD 700TVL Body Box Security Camera Weatherproof Outdoor Day Night Vision for Home CCTV DVR Surveillance System with 6-60mm Auto Iris Lens, Camera Bracket, Power Supply and Extension Cable 1P6
